response.job_title: Internal Sales Engineer at Endress and Hauser Australia
response.summary: Chemical Engineer with experience in technical sales, excellent interpersonal skills and committed to achieving targets.  I am currently working as Internal Sales Engineer at Endress and Hauser Australia, company focused on providing instrumentation and automation solutions for different sort of industries. From my role, I work with QLD Sales Team, offering the most suitable instrumentation solutions for customers of the following sectors: Mining, Oil & Gas, Power & Energy and Chemical Industry.

profile_positions.description:
-Analyzing customers´ requirements as per their process conditions and offering instrumentation solutions to control critical variables such as pressure, level, temperature, flow, as well as analytical variables (i.e. pH, conductivity, turbidity, among others).
-Supporting customers with technical information of the instruments provided that enables them to correctly monitor their processes.
-Ensuring the correct configuration of instruments as per specifications required by customers like materials, process connections, measuring ranges and electrical outputs.
-Working with the sales team to provide competitive offers (quotations and technical documentation) for daily business enquiries and projects.
-Reviewing new instrumentation products to encourage customers to acquire new technologies recently
developed by Endress and Hauser.
-Working on customers´ plans for the implementation of new instrumentation and automation solutions as per the expansion of their operations, identifying their main requirements in terms of costs, materials, electrical and process requirements.
-Following up quotations to guarantee the offers provided technically and commercially fulfil customers' expectations, as well as keeping up to date company´s pipeline to contribute the achievement of sales target.
profile_positions.title: Internal Sales Engineer

profile_positions.description:
-Providing technical consultancy regarding water analysis equipment, both online analyzers and laboratory instruments, for customers of different types of industrial sectors such as food and beverages manufacturing, municipal drinking and wastewater plants, environmental consultancy, education and investigation institutions, among others.
-Achieving the sales targets of each month assigned by the Business Manager and reporting the sales
opportunities developed by using a funnel of projects.
-Managing sales documentation by using SAP Business and analyzing historical information regarding sales.
-Planning, holding business meetings and reporting customer interactions to develop new opportunities and close sales by using the CRM system.
-Working on strategies to increase sales in the area of the country assigned.
-Leading the duties of the sales assistants, along with reporting and analyzing the sales figures achieved each month.
-Configuring, quoting and following up the correct equipment, required to run physicochemical tests for different types of industries both laboratory and online controllers and analyzers.
-Monitoring customers´ equipment operation, to guarantee its performance regarding data accuracy, and operative conditions.
profile_positions.title: Regional Sales Consultant

profile_positions.description:
-Developing internal audits in the plant according to the food safety and quality management system, FSSC 22000.
-Leading and supporting the daily activities developed by operators in the plant.
-Verifying raw materials and final product inventory.
-Evaluating the process conditions regarding the spry drier in the flavors plant.
-Analyzing the data concerning the production orders to guarantee the compliance with quality standards and reporting to the Production Superintendent.
profile_positions.title: Assistant of flavors and fragrances manufacturing plant

education.field_of_study: Environmental Planning and Comprehensive Management of Natural Resources

company.name: Endress+Hauser Group
company.description:
Endress+Hauser is a global leader in measurement and automation technology for process and laboratory applications. The family company, headquartered in Reinach, Switzerland, achieved net sales of approximately 2.9 billion euros in 2021 with a total workforce of more than 15,000. 

Endress+Hauser devices, solutions and services are at home in many industries. Customers thus use them to gain valuable knowledge from their applications. This enables them to improve their products, work economically and at the same time protect people and the environment.

Endress+Hauser is a reliable partner worldwide. Its own sales companies in more than 50 countries as well as representatives in another 70 countries ensure competent support. Production facilities on four continents manufacture quickly and flexibly to the highest quality standards.

Endress+Hauser was founded in 1953 by Georg H Endress and Ludwig Hauser. Ever since, the company has been pushing ahead with the development and use of innovative technologies, now helping to shape the industry’s digital transformation. 8,600 patents and applications protect the Group’s intellectual property.

For further information, please visit www.endress.com/media-center or www.endress.com
